title: The Sundial Salesman
description: Meet Ealing Broadway, a severely flawed working nobody, the consequence of highly dysfunctional parents who insist heâ€™s adopted. 42 and bankrupt, trying to survive America's seedy wasteland dystopia, feeling overdue a salary increase The Sundial Salesman chronicles Broadway blackmailing his wealthy sadistic, drug-taking boss and interactions with protagonist society - hookers (his mother), cheats (kidnappers, banks and big business), pseudo-junkies (his friend), scum (his father).Can Broadway claw his way above the suffocating slumland flotsam for love and salvation?
author: Chassi Albuquerque
